Asceticks, or, The heroick piety & virtue of the ancient Christian anchorets and coenobites. Part I exemplary asceticks. Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.
128 p.
Printed for the authour, London : 1696.
Attributed by Wing to Edward Stephens whose pseudonym was Socrates Christianus. Imperfect: pages stained. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
